alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 02 at 2:54AM PDT until November 03 at 4:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Malibu Coast and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...From noon today to 4 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
